name: Grave Digger
text: Hey! What are you doing here young man
Sunna told me about this place

name: Grave Digger
text: Ahh you've met Sunna I see, well whats your purpose here
I'm just here to pay my respect

name: Grave Digger
text: Well go ahead then, lots of dead people lately ever since the plague spread here

name: Grave Digger
text: have we've met before, you seem oddly familiar
Hmmm, I dont think so sir, I'm new to this village you see

name: Grave Digger
text: Well go on then, I dont want you getting me killed now
